00035 template <typename BP_FP_INT_TYPE>
00036 class btAxisSweep3Internal : public btBroadphaseInterface
00037 {
00038 protected:
00039 
00040         BP_FP_INT_TYPE  m_bpHandleMask;
00041         BP_FP_INT_TYPE  m_handleSentinel;
00042 
00043 public:
00044         
00045  BT_DECLARE_ALIGNED_ALLOCATOR();
00046 
00047         class Edge
00048         {
00049         public:
00050                 BP_FP_INT_TYPE m_pos;                   // low bit is min/max
00051                 BP_FP_INT_TYPE m_handle;
00052 
00053                 BP_FP_INT_TYPE IsMax() const {return static_cast<BP_FP_INT_TYPE>(m_pos & 1);}
00054         };
00055 
00056 public:
00057         class   Handle : public btBroadphaseProxy
00058         {
00059         public:
00060         BT_DECLARE_ALIGNED_ALLOCATOR();
00061         
00062                 // indexes into the edge arrays
00063                 BP_FP_INT_TYPE m_minEdges[3], m_maxEdges[3];            // 6 * 2 = 12
00064 //              BP_FP_INT_TYPE m_uniqueId;
00065                 btBroadphaseProxy*      m_dbvtProxy;//for faster raycast
00066                 //void* m_pOwner; this is now in btBroadphaseProxy.m_clientObject
00067         
00068                 SIMD_FORCE_INLINE void SetNextFree(BP_FP_INT_TYPE next) {m_minEdges[0] = next;}
00069                 SIMD_FORCE_INLINE BP_FP_INT_TYPE GetNextFree() const {return m_minEdges[0];}
00070         };              // 24 bytes + 24 for Edge structures = 44 bytes total per entry
00071 
00072         
00073 protected:
00074         btVector3 m_worldAabbMin;                                               // overall system bounds
00075         btVector3 m_worldAabbMax;                                               // overall system bounds
00076 
00077         btVector3 m_quantize;                                           // scaling factor for quantization
00078 
00079         BP_FP_INT_TYPE m_numHandles;                                            // number of active handles
00080         BP_FP_INT_TYPE m_maxHandles;                                            // max number of handles
00081         Handle* m_pHandles;                                             // handles pool
00082         
00083         BP_FP_INT_TYPE m_firstFreeHandle;               // free handles list
00084 
00085         Edge* m_pEdges[3];                                              // edge arrays for the 3 axes (each array has m_maxHandles * 2 + 2 sentinel entries)
00086         void* m_pEdgesRawPtr[3];
00087 
00088         btOverlappingPairCache* m_pairCache;
00089 
00091         btOverlappingPairCallback* m_userPairCallback;
00092         
00093         bool    m_ownsPairCache;
00094 
00095         int     m_invalidPair;
00096 
00099         btDbvtBroadphase*       m_raycastAccelerator;
00100         btOverlappingPairCache* m_nullPairCache;
00101 
00102 
00103         // allocation/deallocation
00104         BP_FP_INT_TYPE allocHandle();
00105         void freeHandle(BP_FP_INT_TYPE handle);
00106         
00107 
00108         bool testOverlap2D(const Handle* pHandleA, const Handle* pHandleB,int axis0,int axis1);
00109 
00110 #ifdef DEBUG_BROADPHASE
00111         void debugPrintAxis(int axis,bool checkCardinality=true);
00112 #endif //DEBUG_BROADPHASE
00113 
00114         //Overlap* AddOverlap(BP_FP_INT_TYPE handleA, BP_FP_INT_TYPE handleB);
00115         //void RemoveOverlap(BP_FP_INT_TYPE handleA, BP_FP_INT_TYPE handleB);
00116 
00117         
00118 
00119         void sortMinDown(int axis, BP_FP_INT_TYPE edge, btDispatcher* dispatcher, bool updateOverlaps );
00120         void sortMinUp(int axis, BP_FP_INT_TYPE edge, btDispatcher* dispatcher, bool updateOverlaps );
00121         void sortMaxDown(int axis, BP_FP_INT_TYPE edge, btDispatcher* dispatcher, bool updateOverlaps );
00122         void sortMaxUp(int axis, BP_FP_INT_TYPE edge, btDispatcher* dispatcher, bool updateOverlaps );

00140         SIMD_FORCE_INLINE Handle* getHandle(BP_FP_INT_TYPE index) const {return m_pHandles + index;}
00141

00169         }

00174         }

00186         }

00189         {

00208 template <typename BP_FP_INT_TYPE>
00209 void btAxisSweep3<BP_FP_INT_TYPE>::debugPrintAxis(int axis, bool checkCardinality)
00210 {
00211         int numEdges = m_pHandles[0].m_maxEdges[axis];
00212         printf("SAP Axis %d, numEdges=%d\n",axis,numEdges);
00213 
00214         int i;
00215         for (i=0;i<numEdges+1;i++)
00216         {
00217                 Edge* pEdge = m_pEdges[axis] + i;
00218                 Handle* pHandlePrev = getHandle(pEdge->m_handle);
00219                 int handleIndex = pEdge->IsMax()? pHandlePrev->m_maxEdges[axis] : pHandlePrev->m_minEdges[axis];
00220                 char beginOrEnd;
00221                 beginOrEnd=pEdge->IsMax()?'E':'B';
00222                 printf("        [%c,h=%d,p=%x,i=%d]\n",beginOrEnd,pEdge->m_handle,pEdge->m_pos,handleIndex);
00223         }
00224 
00225         if (checkCardinality)
00226                 btAssert(numEdges == m_numHandles*2+1);
00227 }
00228 #endif //DEBUG_BROADPHASE

00230 template <typename BP_FP_INT_TYPE>
00231 btBroadphaseProxy*      btAxisSweep3Internal<BP_FP_INT_TYPE>::createProxy(  const btVector3& aabbMin,  const btVector3& aabbMax,int shapeType,void* userPtr, int collisionFilterGroup, int collisionFilterMask,btDispatcher* dispatcher)
00232 {
00233                 (void)shapeType;
00234                 BP_FP_INT_TYPE handleId = addHandle(aabbMin,aabbMax, userPtr,collisionFilterGroup,collisionFilterMask,dispatcher);
00235                 
00236                 Handle* handle = getHandle(handleId);
00237                 
00238                 if (m_raycastAccelerator)
00239                 {
00240                         btBroadphaseProxy* rayProxy = m_raycastAccelerator->createProxy(aabbMin,aabbMax,shapeType,userPtr,collisionFilterGroup,collisionFilterMask,dispatcher);
00241                         handle->m_dbvtProxy = rayProxy;
00242                 }
00243                 return handle;
00244 }

00248 template <typename BP_FP_INT_TYPE>
00249 void    btAxisSweep3Internal<BP_FP_INT_TYPE>::destroyProxy(btBroadphaseProxy* proxy,btDispatcher* dispatcher)
00250 {
00251         Handle* handle = static_cast<Handle*>(proxy);
00252         if (m_raycastAccelerator)
00253                 m_raycastAccelerator->destroyProxy(handle->m_dbvtProxy,dispatcher);
00254         removeHandle(static_cast<BP_FP_INT_TYPE>(handle->m_uniqueId), dispatcher);
00255 }
00256 
00257 template <typename BP_FP_INT_TYPE>
00258 void    btAxisSweep3Internal<BP_FP_INT_TYPE>::setAabb(btBroadphaseProxy* proxy,const btVector3& aabbMin,const btVector3& aabbMax,btDispatcher* dispatcher)
00259 {
00260         Handle* handle = static_cast<Handle*>(proxy);
00261         handle->m_aabbMin = aabbMin;
00262         handle->m_aabbMax = aabbMax;
00263         updateHandle(static_cast<BP_FP_INT_TYPE>(handle->m_uniqueId), aabbMin, aabbMax,dispatcher);
00264         if (m_raycastAccelerator)
00265                 m_raycastAccelerator->setAabb(handle->m_dbvtProxy,aabbMin,aabbMax,dispatcher);
00266 
00267 }
00268 
00269 template <typename BP_FP_INT_TYPE>
00270 void    btAxisSweep3Internal<BP_FP_INT_TYPE>::rayTest(const btVector3& rayFrom,const btVector3& rayTo, btBroadphaseRayCallback& rayCallback,const btVector3& aabbMin,const btVector3& aabbMax)
00271 {
00272         if (m_raycastAccelerator)
00273         {
00274                 m_raycastAccelerator->rayTest(rayFrom,rayTo,rayCallback,aabbMin,aabbMax);
00275         } else
00276         {
00277                 //choose axis?
00278                 BP_FP_INT_TYPE axis = 0;
00279                 //for each proxy
00280                 for (BP_FP_INT_TYPE i=1;i<m_numHandles*2+1;i++)
00281                 {
00282                         if (m_pEdges[axis][i].IsMax())
00283                         {
00284                                 rayCallback.process(getHandle(m_pEdges[axis][i].m_handle));
00285                         }
00286                 }
00287         }
00288 }
00289 
00290 template <typename BP_FP_INT_TYPE>
00291 void    btAxisSweep3Internal<BP_FP_INT_TYPE>::aabbTest(const btVector3& aabbMin, const btVector3& aabbMax, btBroadphaseAabbCallback& callback)
00292 {
00293         if (m_raycastAccelerator)
00294         {
00295                 m_raycastAccelerator->aabbTest(aabbMin,aabbMax,callback);
00296         } else
00297         {
00298                 //choose axis?
00299                 BP_FP_INT_TYPE axis = 0;
00300                 //for each proxy
00301                 for (BP_FP_INT_TYPE i=1;i<m_numHandles*2+1;i++)
00302                 {
00303                         if (m_pEdges[axis][i].IsMax())
00304                         {
00305                                 Handle* handle = getHandle(m_pEdges[axis][i].m_handle);
00306                                 if (TestAabbAgainstAabb2(aabbMin,aabbMax,handle->m_aabbMin,handle->m_aabbMax))
00307                                 {
00308                                         callback.process(handle);
00309                                 }
00310                         }
00311                 }
00312         }
00313 }

00317 template <typename BP_FP_INT_TYPE>
00318 void btAxisSweep3Internal<BP_FP_INT_TYPE>::getAabb(btBroadphaseProxy* proxy,btVector3& aabbMin, btVector3& aabbMax ) const
00319 {
00320         Handle* pHandle = static_cast<Handle*>(proxy);
00321         aabbMin = pHandle->m_aabbMin;
00322         aabbMax = pHandle->m_aabbMax;
00323 }

00325 
00326 template <typename BP_FP_INT_TYPE>
00327 void btAxisSweep3Internal<BP_FP_INT_TYPE>::unQuantize(btBroadphaseProxy* proxy,btVector3& aabbMin, btVector3& aabbMax ) const
00328 {
00329         Handle* pHandle = static_cast<Handle*>(proxy);
00330 
00331         unsigned short vecInMin[3];
00332         unsigned short vecInMax[3];
00333 
00334         vecInMin[0] = m_pEdges[0][pHandle->m_minEdges[0]].m_pos ;
00335         vecInMax[0] = m_pEdges[0][pHandle->m_maxEdges[0]].m_pos +1 ;
00336         vecInMin[1] = m_pEdges[1][pHandle->m_minEdges[1]].m_pos ;
00337         vecInMax[1] = m_pEdges[1][pHandle->m_maxEdges[1]].m_pos +1 ;
00338         vecInMin[2] = m_pEdges[2][pHandle->m_minEdges[2]].m_pos ;
00339         vecInMax[2] = m_pEdges[2][pHandle->m_maxEdges[2]].m_pos +1 ;
00340         
00341         aabbMin.setValue((btScalar)(vecInMin[0]) / (m_quantize.getX()),(btScalar)(vecInMin[1]) / (m_quantize.getY()),(btScalar)(vecInMin[2]) / (m_quantize.getZ()));
00342         aabbMin += m_worldAabbMin;
00343         
00344         aabbMax.setValue((btScalar)(vecInMax[0]) / (m_quantize.getX()),(btScalar)(vecInMax[1]) / (m_quantize.getY()),(btScalar)(vecInMax[2]) / (m_quantize.getZ()));
00345         aabbMax += m_worldAabbMin;
00346 }

00350 
00351 template <typename BP_FP_INT_TYPE>
00352 btAxisSweep3Internal<BP_FP_INT_TYPE>::btAxisSweep3Internal(const btVector3& worldAabbMin,const btVector3& worldAabbMax, BP_FP_INT_TYPE handleMask, BP_FP_INT_TYPE handleSentinel,BP_FP_INT_TYPE userMaxHandles, btOverlappingPairCache* pairCache , bool disableRaycastAccelerator)
00353 :m_bpHandleMask(handleMask),
00354 m_handleSentinel(handleSentinel),
00355 m_pairCache(pairCache),
00356 m_userPairCallback(0),
00357 m_ownsPairCache(false),
00358 m_invalidPair(0),
00359 m_raycastAccelerator(0)
00360 {
00361         BP_FP_INT_TYPE maxHandles = static_cast<BP_FP_INT_TYPE>(userMaxHandles+1);//need to add one sentinel handle
00362 
00363         if (!m_pairCache)
00364         {
00365                 void* ptr = btAlignedAlloc(sizeof(btHashedOverlappingPairCache),16);
00366                 m_pairCache = new(ptr) btHashedOverlappingPairCache();
00367                 m_ownsPairCache = true;
00368         }
00369 
00370         if (!disableRaycastAccelerator)
00371         {
00372                 m_nullPairCache = new (btAlignedAlloc(sizeof(btNullPairCache),16)) btNullPairCache();
00373                 m_raycastAccelerator = new (btAlignedAlloc(sizeof(btDbvtBroadphase),16)) btDbvtBroadphase(m_nullPairCache);//m_pairCache);
00374                 m_raycastAccelerator->m_deferedcollide = true;//don't add/remove pairs
00375         }
00376 
00377         //btAssert(bounds.HasVolume());
00378 
00379         // init bounds
00380         m_worldAabbMin = worldAabbMin;
00381         m_worldAabbMax = worldAabbMax;
00382 
00383         btVector3 aabbSize = m_worldAabbMax - m_worldAabbMin;
00384 
00385         BP_FP_INT_TYPE  maxInt = m_handleSentinel;
00386 
00387         m_quantize = btVector3(btScalar(maxInt),btScalar(maxInt),btScalar(maxInt)) / aabbSize;
00388 
00389         // allocate handles buffer, using btAlignedAlloc, and put all handles on free list
00390         m_pHandles = new Handle[maxHandles];
00391         
00392         m_maxHandles = maxHandles;
00393         m_numHandles = 0;
00394 
00395         // handle 0 is reserved as the null index, and is also used as the sentinel
00396         m_firstFreeHandle = 1;
00397         {
00398                 for (BP_FP_INT_TYPE i = m_firstFreeHandle; i < maxHandles; i++)
00399                         m_pHandles[i].SetNextFree(static_cast<BP_FP_INT_TYPE>(i + 1));
00400                 m_pHandles[maxHandles - 1].SetNextFree(0);
00401         }
00402 
00403         {
00404                 // allocate edge buffers
00405                 for (int i = 0; i < 3; i++)
00406                 {
00407                         m_pEdgesRawPtr[i] = btAlignedAlloc(sizeof(Edge)*maxHandles*2,16);
00408                         m_pEdges[i] = new(m_pEdgesRawPtr[i]) Edge[maxHandles * 2];
00409                 }
00410         }
00411         //removed overlap management
00412 
00413         // make boundary sentinels
00414         
00415         m_pHandles[0].m_clientObject = 0;
00416 
00417         for (int axis = 0; axis < 3; axis++)
00418         {
00419                 m_pHandles[0].m_minEdges[axis] = 0;
00420                 m_pHandles[0].m_maxEdges[axis] = 1;
00421 
00422                 m_pEdges[axis][0].m_pos = 0;
00423                 m_pEdges[axis][0].m_handle = 0;
00424                 m_pEdges[axis][1].m_pos = m_handleSentinel;
00425                 m_pEdges[axis][1].m_handle = 0;
00426 #ifdef DEBUG_BROADPHASE
00427                 debugPrintAxis(axis);
00428 #endif //DEBUG_BROADPHASE
00429 
00430         }
00431 
00432 }
00433 
00434 template <typename BP_FP_INT_TYPE>
00435 btAxisSweep3Internal<BP_FP_INT_TYPE>::~btAxisSweep3Internal()
00436 {
00437         if (m_raycastAccelerator)
00438         {
00439                 m_nullPairCache->~btOverlappingPairCache();
00440                 btAlignedFree(m_nullPairCache);
00441                 m_raycastAccelerator->~btDbvtBroadphase();
00442                 btAlignedFree (m_raycastAccelerator);
00443         }
00444 
00445         for (int i = 2; i >= 0; i--)
00446         {
00447                 btAlignedFree(m_pEdgesRawPtr[i]);
00448         }
00449         delete [] m_pHandles;
00450 
00451         if (m_ownsPairCache)
00452         {
00453                 m_pairCache->~btOverlappingPairCache();
00454                 btAlignedFree(m_pairCache);
00455         }
00456 }
00457 
00458 template <typename BP_FP_INT_TYPE>
00459 void btAxisSweep3Internal<BP_FP_INT_TYPE>::quantize(BP_FP_INT_TYPE* out, const btVector3& point, int isMax) const
00460 {
00461 #ifdef OLD_CLAMPING_METHOD
00464         btVector3 clampedPoint(point);
00465         clampedPoint.setMax(m_worldAabbMin);
00466         clampedPoint.setMin(m_worldAabbMax);
00467         btVector3 v = (clampedPoint - m_worldAabbMin) * m_quantize;
00468         out[0] = (BP_FP_INT_TYPE)(((BP_FP_INT_TYPE)v.getX() & m_bpHandleMask) | isMax);
00469         out[1] = (BP_FP_INT_TYPE)(((BP_FP_INT_TYPE)v.getY() & m_bpHandleMask) | isMax);
00470         out[2] = (BP_FP_INT_TYPE)(((BP_FP_INT_TYPE)v.getZ() & m_bpHandleMask) | isMax);
00471 #else
00472         btVector3 v = (point - m_worldAabbMin) * m_quantize;
00473         out[0]=(v[0]<=0)?(BP_FP_INT_TYPE)isMax:(v[0]>=m_handleSentinel)?(BP_FP_INT_TYPE)((m_handleSentinel&m_bpHandleMask)|isMax):(BP_FP_INT_TYPE)(((BP_FP_INT_TYPE)v[0]&m_bpHandleMask)|isMax);
00474         out[1]=(v[1]<=0)?(BP_FP_INT_TYPE)isMax:(v[1]>=m_handleSentinel)?(BP_FP_INT_TYPE)((m_handleSentinel&m_bpHandleMask)|isMax):(BP_FP_INT_TYPE)(((BP_FP_INT_TYPE)v[1]&m_bpHandleMask)|isMax);
00475         out[2]=(v[2]<=0)?(BP_FP_INT_TYPE)isMax:(v[2]>=m_handleSentinel)?(BP_FP_INT_TYPE)((m_handleSentinel&m_bpHandleMask)|isMax):(BP_FP_INT_TYPE)(((BP_FP_INT_TYPE)v[2]&m_bpHandleMask)|isMax);
00476 #endif //OLD_CLAMPING_METHOD
00477 }
00478 
00479 
00480 template <typename BP_FP_INT_TYPE>
00481 BP_FP_INT_TYPE btAxisSweep3Internal<BP_FP_INT_TYPE>::allocHandle()
00482 {
00483         btAssert(m_firstFreeHandle);
00484 
00485         BP_FP_INT_TYPE handle = m_firstFreeHandle;
00486         m_firstFreeHandle = getHandle(handle)->GetNextFree();
00487         m_numHandles++;
00488 
00489         return handle;
00490 }
00491 
00492 template <typename BP_FP_INT_TYPE>
00493 void btAxisSweep3Internal<BP_FP_INT_TYPE>::freeHandle(BP_FP_INT_TYPE handle)
00494 {
00495         btAssert(handle > 0 && handle < m_maxHandles);
00496 
00497         getHandle(handle)->SetNextFree(m_firstFreeHandle);
00498         m_firstFreeHandle = handle;
00499 
00500         m_numHandles--;
00501 }
00502 
00503 
00504 template <typename BP_FP_INT_TYPE>
00505 BP_FP_INT_TYPE btAxisSweep3Internal<BP_FP_INT_TYPE>::addHandle(const btVector3& aabbMin,const btVector3& aabbMax, void* pOwner, int collisionFilterGroup, int collisionFilterMask,btDispatcher* dispatcher)
00506 {
00507         // quantize the bounds
00508         BP_FP_INT_TYPE min[3], max[3];
00509         quantize(min, aabbMin, 0);
00510         quantize(max, aabbMax, 1);
00511 
00512         // allocate a handle
00513         BP_FP_INT_TYPE handle = allocHandle();
00514         
00515 
00516         Handle* pHandle = getHandle(handle);
00517         
00518         pHandle->m_uniqueId = static_cast<int>(handle);
00519         //pHandle->m_pOverlaps = 0;
00520         pHandle->m_clientObject = pOwner;
00521         pHandle->m_collisionFilterGroup = collisionFilterGroup;
00522         pHandle->m_collisionFilterMask = collisionFilterMask;
00523 
00524         // compute current limit of edge arrays
00525         BP_FP_INT_TYPE limit = static_cast<BP_FP_INT_TYPE>(m_numHandles * 2);
00526 
00527         
00528         // insert new edges just inside the max boundary edge
00529         for (BP_FP_INT_TYPE axis = 0; axis < 3; axis++)
00530         {
00531 
00532                 m_pHandles[0].m_maxEdges[axis] += 2;
00533 
00534                 m_pEdges[axis][limit + 1] = m_pEdges[axis][limit - 1];
00535 
00536                 m_pEdges[axis][limit - 1].m_pos = min[axis];
00537                 m_pEdges[axis][limit - 1].m_handle = handle;
00538 
00539                 m_pEdges[axis][limit].m_pos = max[axis];
00540                 m_pEdges[axis][limit].m_handle = handle;
00541 
00542                 pHandle->m_minEdges[axis] = static_cast<BP_FP_INT_TYPE>(limit - 1);
00543                 pHandle->m_maxEdges[axis] = limit;
00544         }
00545 
00546         // now sort the new edges to their correct position
00547         sortMinDown(0, pHandle->m_minEdges[0], dispatcher,false);
00548         sortMaxDown(0, pHandle->m_maxEdges[0], dispatcher,false);
00549         sortMinDown(1, pHandle->m_minEdges[1], dispatcher,false);
00550         sortMaxDown(1, pHandle->m_maxEdges[1], dispatcher,false);
00551         sortMinDown(2, pHandle->m_minEdges[2], dispatcher,true);
00552         sortMaxDown(2, pHandle->m_maxEdges[2], dispatcher,true);
00553 
00554 
00555         return handle;
00556 }
00557 
00558 
00559 template <typename BP_FP_INT_TYPE>
00560 void btAxisSweep3Internal<BP_FP_INT_TYPE>::removeHandle(BP_FP_INT_TYPE handle,btDispatcher* dispatcher)
00561 {
00562 
00563         Handle* pHandle = getHandle(handle);
00564 
00565         //explicitly remove the pairs containing the proxy
00566         //we could do it also in the sortMinUp (passing true)
00568         if (!m_pairCache->hasDeferredRemoval())
00569         {
00570                 m_pairCache->removeOverlappingPairsContainingProxy(pHandle,dispatcher);
00571         }
00572 
00573         // compute current limit of edge arrays
00574         int limit = static_cast<int>(m_numHandles * 2);
00575         
00576         int axis;
00577 
00578         for (axis = 0;axis<3;axis++)
00579         {
00580                 m_pHandles[0].m_maxEdges[axis] -= 2;
00581         }
00582 
00583         // remove the edges by sorting them up to the end of the list
00584         for ( axis = 0; axis < 3; axis++)
00585         {
00586                 Edge* pEdges = m_pEdges[axis];
00587                 BP_FP_INT_TYPE max = pHandle->m_maxEdges[axis];
00588                 pEdges[max].m_pos = m_handleSentinel;
00589 
00590                 sortMaxUp(axis,max,dispatcher,false);
00591 
00592 
00593                 BP_FP_INT_TYPE i = pHandle->m_minEdges[axis];
00594                 pEdges[i].m_pos = m_handleSentinel;
00595 
00596 
00597                 sortMinUp(axis,i,dispatcher,false);
00598 
00599                 pEdges[limit-1].m_handle = 0;
00600                 pEdges[limit-1].m_pos = m_handleSentinel;
00601                 
00602 #ifdef DEBUG_BROADPHASE
00603                         debugPrintAxis(axis,false);
00604 #endif //DEBUG_BROADPHASE
00605 
00606 
00607         }
00608 
00609 
00610         // free the handle
00611         freeHandle(handle);
00612 
00613         
00614 }
00615 
00616 template <typename BP_FP_INT_TYPE>
00617 void btAxisSweep3Internal<BP_FP_INT_TYPE>::resetPool(btDispatcher* /*dispatcher*/)
00618 {
00619         if (m_numHandles == 0)
00620         {
00621                 m_firstFreeHandle = 1;
00622                 {
00623                         for (BP_FP_INT_TYPE i = m_firstFreeHandle; i < m_maxHandles; i++)
00624                                 m_pHandles[i].SetNextFree(static_cast<BP_FP_INT_TYPE>(i + 1));
00625                         m_pHandles[m_maxHandles - 1].SetNextFree(0);
00626                 }
00627         }
00628 }       
00629 
00630 
00631 extern int gOverlappingPairs;
00632 //#include <stdio.h>
00633 
00634 template <typename BP_FP_INT_TYPE>
00635 void    btAxisSweep3Internal<BP_FP_INT_TYPE>::calculateOverlappingPairs(btDispatcher* dispatcher)
00636 {
00637 
00638         if (m_pairCache->hasDeferredRemoval())
00639         {
00640         
00641                 btBroadphasePairArray&  overlappingPairArray = m_pairCache->getOverlappingPairArray();
00642 
00643                 //perform a sort, to find duplicates and to sort 'invalid' pairs to the end
00644                 overlappingPairArray.quickSort(btBroadphasePairSortPredicate());
00645 
00646                 overlappingPairArray.resize(overlappingPairArray.size() - m_invalidPair);
00647                 m_invalidPair = 0;
00648 
00649                 
00650                 int i;
00651 
00652                 btBroadphasePair previousPair;
00653                 previousPair.m_pProxy0 = 0;
00654                 previousPair.m_pProxy1 = 0;
00655                 previousPair.m_algorithm = 0;
00656                 
00657                 
00658                 for (i=0;i<overlappingPairArray.size();i++)
00659                 {
00660                 
00661                         btBroadphasePair& pair = overlappingPairArray[i];
00662 
00663                         bool isDuplicate = (pair == previousPair);
00664 
00665                         previousPair = pair;
00666 
00667                         bool needsRemoval = false;
00668 
00669                         if (!isDuplicate)
00670                         {
00672                                 bool hasOverlap = testAabbOverlap(pair.m_pProxy0,pair.m_pProxy1);
00673 
00674                                 if (hasOverlap)
00675                                 {
00676                                         needsRemoval = false;//callback->processOverlap(pair);
00677                                 } else
00678                                 {
00679                                         needsRemoval = true;
00680                                 }
00681                         } else
00682                         {
00683                                 //remove duplicate
00684                                 needsRemoval = true;
00685                                 //should have no algorithm
00686                                 btAssert(!pair.m_algorithm);
00687                         }
00688                         
00689                         if (needsRemoval)
00690                         {
00691                                 m_pairCache->cleanOverlappingPair(pair,dispatcher);
00692 
00693                 //              m_overlappingPairArray.swap(i,m_overlappingPairArray.size()-1);
00694                 //              m_overlappingPairArray.pop_back();
00695                                 pair.m_pProxy0 = 0;
00696                                 pair.m_pProxy1 = 0;
00697                                 m_invalidPair++;
00698                                 gOverlappingPairs--;
00699                         } 
00700                         
00701                 }
00702 
00704         #define CLEAN_INVALID_PAIRS 1
00705         #ifdef CLEAN_INVALID_PAIRS
00706 
00707                 //perform a sort, to sort 'invalid' pairs to the end
00708                 overlappingPairArray.quickSort(btBroadphasePairSortPredicate());
00709 
00710                 overlappingPairArray.resize(overlappingPairArray.size() - m_invalidPair);
00711                 m_invalidPair = 0;
00712         #endif//CLEAN_INVALID_PAIRS
00713                 
00714                 //printf("overlappingPairArray.size()=%d\n",overlappingPairArray.size());
00715         }
00716 
00717 }
00718 
00719 
00720 template <typename BP_FP_INT_TYPE>
00721 bool btAxisSweep3Internal<BP_FP_INT_TYPE>::testAabbOverlap(btBroadphaseProxy* proxy0,btBroadphaseProxy* proxy1)
00722 {
00723         const Handle* pHandleA = static_cast<Handle*>(proxy0);
00724         const Handle* pHandleB = static_cast<Handle*>(proxy1);
00725         
00726         //optimization 1: check the array index (memory address), instead of the m_pos
00727 
00728         for (int axis = 0; axis < 3; axis++)
00729         { 
00730                 if (pHandleA->m_maxEdges[axis] < pHandleB->m_minEdges[axis] || 
00731                         pHandleB->m_maxEdges[axis] < pHandleA->m_minEdges[axis]) 
00732                 { 
00733                         return false; 
00734                 } 
00735         } 
00736         return true;
00737 }
00738 
00739 template <typename BP_FP_INT_TYPE>
00740 bool btAxisSweep3Internal<BP_FP_INT_TYPE>::testOverlap2D(const Handle* pHandleA, const Handle* pHandleB,int axis0,int axis1)
00741 {
00742         //optimization 1: check the array index (memory address), instead of the m_pos
00743 
00744         if (pHandleA->m_maxEdges[axis0] < pHandleB->m_minEdges[axis0] || 
00745                 pHandleB->m_maxEdges[axis0] < pHandleA->m_minEdges[axis0] ||
00746                 pHandleA->m_maxEdges[axis1] < pHandleB->m_minEdges[axis1] ||
00747                 pHandleB->m_maxEdges[axis1] < pHandleA->m_minEdges[axis1]) 
00748         { 
00749                 return false; 
00750         } 
00751         return true;
00752 }
00753 
00754 template <typename BP_FP_INT_TYPE>
00755 void btAxisSweep3Internal<BP_FP_INT_TYPE>::updateHandle(BP_FP_INT_TYPE handle, const btVector3& aabbMin,const btVector3& aabbMax,btDispatcher* dispatcher)
00756 {
00757 //      btAssert(bounds.IsFinite());
00758         //btAssert(bounds.HasVolume());
00759 
00760         Handle* pHandle = getHandle(handle);
00761 
00762         // quantize the new bounds
00763         BP_FP_INT_TYPE min[3], max[3];
00764         quantize(min, aabbMin, 0);
00765         quantize(max, aabbMax, 1);
00766 
00767         // update changed edges
00768         for (int axis = 0; axis < 3; axis++)
00769         {
00770                 BP_FP_INT_TYPE emin = pHandle->m_minEdges[axis];
00771                 BP_FP_INT_TYPE emax = pHandle->m_maxEdges[axis];
00772 
00773                 int dmin = (int)min[axis] - (int)m_pEdges[axis][emin].m_pos;
00774                 int dmax = (int)max[axis] - (int)m_pEdges[axis][emax].m_pos;
00775 
00776                 m_pEdges[axis][emin].m_pos = min[axis];
00777                 m_pEdges[axis][emax].m_pos = max[axis];
00778 
00779                 // expand (only adds overlaps)
00780                 if (dmin < 0)
00781                         sortMinDown(axis, emin,dispatcher,true);
00782 
00783                 if (dmax > 0)
00784                         sortMaxUp(axis, emax,dispatcher,true);
00785 
00786                 // shrink (only removes overlaps)
00787                 if (dmin > 0)
00788                         sortMinUp(axis, emin,dispatcher,true);
00789 
00790                 if (dmax < 0)
00791                         sortMaxDown(axis, emax,dispatcher,true);
00792 
00793 #ifdef DEBUG_BROADPHASE
00794         debugPrintAxis(axis);
00795 #endif //DEBUG_BROADPHASE
00796         }
00797 
00798         
00799 }
00800 
00801 
00802 
00803 
00804 // sorting a min edge downwards can only ever *add* overlaps
00805 template <typename BP_FP_INT_TYPE>
00806 void btAxisSweep3Internal<BP_FP_INT_TYPE>::sortMinDown(int axis, BP_FP_INT_TYPE edge, btDispatcher* /* dispatcher */, bool updateOverlaps)
00807 {
00808 
00809         Edge* pEdge = m_pEdges[axis] + edge;
00810         Edge* pPrev = pEdge - 1;
00811         Handle* pHandleEdge = getHandle(pEdge->m_handle);
00812 
00813         while (pEdge->m_pos < pPrev->m_pos)
00814         {
00815                 Handle* pHandlePrev = getHandle(pPrev->m_handle);
00816 
00817                 if (pPrev->IsMax())
00818                 {
00819                         // if previous edge is a maximum check the bounds and add an overlap if necessary
00820                         const int axis1 = (1  << axis) & 3;
00821                         const int axis2 = (1  << axis1) & 3;
00822                         if (updateOverlaps && testOverlap2D(pHandleEdge, pHandlePrev,axis1,axis2))
00823                         {
00824                                 m_pairCache->addOverlappingPair(pHandleEdge,pHandlePrev);
00825                                 if (m_userPairCallback)
00826                                         m_userPairCallback->addOverlappingPair(pHandleEdge,pHandlePrev);
00827 
00828                                 //AddOverlap(pEdge->m_handle, pPrev->m_handle);
00829 
00830                         }
00831 
00832                         // update edge reference in other handle
00833                         pHandlePrev->m_maxEdges[axis]++;
00834                 }
00835                 else
00836                         pHandlePrev->m_minEdges[axis]++;
00837 
00838                 pHandleEdge->m_minEdges[axis]--;
00839 
00840                 // swap the edges
00841                 Edge swap = *pEdge;
00842                 *pEdge = *pPrev;
00843                 *pPrev = swap;
00844 
00845                 // decrement
00846                 pEdge--;
00847                 pPrev--;
00848         }
00849 
00850 #ifdef DEBUG_BROADPHASE
00851         debugPrintAxis(axis);
00852 #endif //DEBUG_BROADPHASE
00853 
00854 }
00855 
00856 // sorting a min edge upwards can only ever *remove* overlaps
00857 template <typename BP_FP_INT_TYPE>
00858 void btAxisSweep3Internal<BP_FP_INT_TYPE>::sortMinUp(int axis, BP_FP_INT_TYPE edge, btDispatcher* dispatcher, bool updateOverlaps)
00859 {
00860         Edge* pEdge = m_pEdges[axis] + edge;
00861         Edge* pNext = pEdge + 1;
00862         Handle* pHandleEdge = getHandle(pEdge->m_handle);
00863 
00864         while (pNext->m_handle && (pEdge->m_pos >= pNext->m_pos))
00865         {
00866                 Handle* pHandleNext = getHandle(pNext->m_handle);
00867 
00868                 if (pNext->IsMax())
00869                 {
00870                         Handle* handle0 = getHandle(pEdge->m_handle);
00871                         Handle* handle1 = getHandle(pNext->m_handle);
00872                         const int axis1 = (1  << axis) & 3;
00873                         const int axis2 = (1  << axis1) & 3;
00874                         
00875                         // if next edge is maximum remove any overlap between the two handles
00876                         if (updateOverlaps 
00877 #ifdef USE_OVERLAP_TEST_ON_REMOVES
00878                                 && testOverlap2D(handle0,handle1,axis1,axis2)
00879 #endif //USE_OVERLAP_TEST_ON_REMOVES
00880                                 )
00881                         {
00882                                 
00883 
00884                                 m_pairCache->removeOverlappingPair(handle0,handle1,dispatcher); 
00885                                 if (m_userPairCallback)
00886                                         m_userPairCallback->removeOverlappingPair(handle0,handle1,dispatcher);
00887                                 
00888                         }
00889 
00890 
00891                         // update edge reference in other handle
00892                         pHandleNext->m_maxEdges[axis]--;
00893                 }
00894                 else
00895                         pHandleNext->m_minEdges[axis]--;
00896 
00897                 pHandleEdge->m_minEdges[axis]++;
00898 
00899                 // swap the edges
00900                 Edge swap = *pEdge;
00901                 *pEdge = *pNext;
00902                 *pNext = swap;
00903 
00904                 // increment
00905                 pEdge++;
00906                 pNext++;
00907         }
00908 
00909 
00910 }
00911 
00912 // sorting a max edge downwards can only ever *remove* overlaps
00913 template <typename BP_FP_INT_TYPE>
00914 void btAxisSweep3Internal<BP_FP_INT_TYPE>::sortMaxDown(int axis, BP_FP_INT_TYPE edge, btDispatcher* dispatcher, bool updateOverlaps)
00915 {
00916 
00917         Edge* pEdge = m_pEdges[axis] + edge;
00918         Edge* pPrev = pEdge - 1;
00919         Handle* pHandleEdge = getHandle(pEdge->m_handle);
00920 
00921         while (pEdge->m_pos < pPrev->m_pos)
00922         {
00923                 Handle* pHandlePrev = getHandle(pPrev->m_handle);
00924 
00925                 if (!pPrev->IsMax())
00926                 {
00927                         // if previous edge was a minimum remove any overlap between the two handles
00928                         Handle* handle0 = getHandle(pEdge->m_handle);
00929                         Handle* handle1 = getHandle(pPrev->m_handle);
00930                         const int axis1 = (1  << axis) & 3;
00931                         const int axis2 = (1  << axis1) & 3;
00932 
00933                         if (updateOverlaps  
00934 #ifdef USE_OVERLAP_TEST_ON_REMOVES
00935                                 && testOverlap2D(handle0,handle1,axis1,axis2)
00936 #endif //USE_OVERLAP_TEST_ON_REMOVES
00937                                 )
00938                         {
00939                                 //this is done during the overlappingpairarray iteration/narrowphase collision
00940 
00941                                 
00942                                 m_pairCache->removeOverlappingPair(handle0,handle1,dispatcher);
00943                                 if (m_userPairCallback)
00944                                         m_userPairCallback->removeOverlappingPair(handle0,handle1,dispatcher);
00945                         
00946 
00947 
00948                         }
00949 
00950                         // update edge reference in other handle
00951                         pHandlePrev->m_minEdges[axis]++;;
00952                 }
00953                 else
00954                         pHandlePrev->m_maxEdges[axis]++;
00955 
00956                 pHandleEdge->m_maxEdges[axis]--;
00957 
00958                 // swap the edges
00959                 Edge swap = *pEdge;
00960                 *pEdge = *pPrev;
00961                 *pPrev = swap;
00962 
00963                 // decrement
00964                 pEdge--;
00965                 pPrev--;
00966         }
00967 
00968         
00969 #ifdef DEBUG_BROADPHASE
00970         debugPrintAxis(axis);
00971 #endif //DEBUG_BROADPHASE
00972 
00973 }
00974 
00975 // sorting a max edge upwards can only ever *add* overlaps
00976 template <typename BP_FP_INT_TYPE>
00977 void btAxisSweep3Internal<BP_FP_INT_TYPE>::sortMaxUp(int axis, BP_FP_INT_TYPE edge, btDispatcher* /* dispatcher */, bool updateOverlaps)
00978 {
00979         Edge* pEdge = m_pEdges[axis] + edge;
00980         Edge* pNext = pEdge + 1;
00981         Handle* pHandleEdge = getHandle(pEdge->m_handle);
00982 
00983         while (pNext->m_handle && (pEdge->m_pos >= pNext->m_pos))
00984         {
00985                 Handle* pHandleNext = getHandle(pNext->m_handle);
00986 
00987                 const int axis1 = (1  << axis) & 3;
00988                 const int axis2 = (1  << axis1) & 3;
00989 
00990                 if (!pNext->IsMax())
00991                 {
00992                         // if next edge is a minimum check the bounds and add an overlap if necessary
00993                         if (updateOverlaps && testOverlap2D(pHandleEdge, pHandleNext,axis1,axis2))
00994                         {
00995                                 Handle* handle0 = getHandle(pEdge->m_handle);
00996                                 Handle* handle1 = getHandle(pNext->m_handle);
00997                                 m_pairCache->addOverlappingPair(handle0,handle1);
00998                                 if (m_userPairCallback)
00999                                         m_userPairCallback->addOverlappingPair(handle0,handle1);
01000                         }
01001 
01002                         // update edge reference in other handle
01003                         pHandleNext->m_minEdges[axis]--;
01004                 }
01005                 else
01006                         pHandleNext->m_maxEdges[axis]--;
01007 
01008                 pHandleEdge->m_maxEdges[axis]++;
01009 
01010                 // swap the edges
01011                 Edge swap = *pEdge;
01012                 *pEdge = *pNext;
01013                 *pNext = swap;
01014 
01015                 // increment
01016                 pEdge++;
01017                 pNext++;
01018         }
01019         
01020 }
